languages.text: {n}Комиссар излагает бодро и энергично:{/n} "Группе наших товарищей удалось захватить небольшое судно ксеносов, стоявшее на ремонте в удаленном неиспользуемом звездном доке. Его экипаж был тайно перебит, в живых оставили только лоцмана, который проведет корабль обратно в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальный мир{/g}. В док можно попасть через пространственный портал, находящийся на нашей старой базе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Комиссар излагает бодро и энергично:{/n} "Группе наших товарищей удалось захватить небольшое судно ксеносов, стоявшее на ремонте в удаленном неиспользуемом звездном доке. Его экипаж был тайно перебит, в живых оставили только лоцмана, который проведет корабль обратно в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальный мир{/g}. В док можно попасть через пространственный портал, находящийся на нашей старой базе".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар излагает бодро и энергично:{/n} "Группе наших товарищей удалось захватить небольшое судно ксеносов, стоявшее на ремонте в удаленном неиспользуемом звездном доке. Его экипаж был тайно перебит, в живых оставили только лоцмана, который проведет корабль обратно в {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальный мир{/g}. В док можно попасть через пространственный портал, находящийся на нашей старой базе".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "A group of our comrades captured a small xenos ship that had stopped for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew without drawing attention. Only the pilot was left alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委的话听起来很轻快，充满了活力。{/n}“之前，有一艘小型异形飞船在偏远的闲置码头上进行维修。我们的战士夺走了那艘飞船，他们悄悄地消灭了所有船员，但没有杀飞行员，好让飞行员把船开回{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}。我们可以通过旧基地里的传送门抵达那个码头。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委的话听起来很轻快，充满了活力。{/n}“之前，有一艘小型异形飞船在偏远的闲置码头上进行维修。我们的战士夺走了那艘飞船，他们悄悄地消灭了所有船员，但没有杀飞行员，好让飞行员把船开回{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}。我们可以通过旧基地里的传送门抵达那个码头。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは爽やかに、力強く答える。{/n}「遠方の未使用のドックに修理のために停泊していた小型の異種族の船を仲間が捕らえた。クルーは迅速に始末しましたが、船を{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}に戻すためにパイロットだけを生かしておきました。我々の古い基地にある次元ポータルを通じてそこのドックに行くことが可能です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは爽やかに、力強く答える。{/n}「遠方の未使用のドックに修理のために停泊していた小型の異種族の船を仲間が捕らえた。クルーは迅速に始末しましたが、船を{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}に戻すためにパイロットだけを生かしておきました。我々の古い基地にある次元ポータルを通じてそこのドックに行くことが可能です」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}La explicación del Comisario es rápida y enérgica:{/n} «Algunos de los nuestros capturaron una pequeña nave xenos que estaba estacionada para su reparación en un muelle apartado y sin tráfico. Eliminaron a la tripulación con sigilo, pero dejaron al piloto vivo para que nos lleve de vuelta al {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}. Podemos volver al muelle a través de un portal dimensional en nuestra base».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

traits.locale_text: {n}La explicación del Comisario es rápida y enérgica:{/n} «Algunos de los nuestros capturaron una pequeña nave xenos que estaba estacionada para su reparación en un muelle apartado y sin tráfico. Eliminaron a la tripulación con sigilo, pero dejaron al piloto vivo para que nos lleve de vuelta al {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}. Podemos volver al muelle a través de un portal dimensional en nuestra base».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to realspace. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire vous répond sur un ton énergique :{/n} « Mes hommes se sont emparés d'un petit vaisseau xénos amarré à un quai isolé en attendant d'être réparé. Ils ont éliminé tout l'équipage à l'exception du pilote, pour qu'il puisse mener le vaisseau jusqu'à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. Un portail dimensionnel situé dans notre ancienne base permet de rejoindre directement le quai. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire vous répond sur un ton énergique :{/n} « Mes hommes se sont emparés d'un petit vaisseau xénos amarré à un quai isolé en attendant d'être réparé. Ils ont éliminé tout l'équipage à l'exception du pilote, pour qu'il puisse mener le vaisseau jusqu'à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}. Un portail dimensionnel situé dans notre ancienne base permet de rejoindre directement le quai. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar spricht knapp und eifrig:{/n} "Einige der Unseren haben ein kleines Xenos-Schiff gekapert, das zur Reparatur an einem abgelegenen, unbenutzten Dock lag. Sie haben die Crew unauffällig eliminiert, aber den Piloten am Leben gelassen, damit er das Schiff in den {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} zurückbringen kann. Zu dem Dock gelangen wir durch ein Dimensionsportal in unserer alten Basis."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar spricht knapp und eifrig:{/n} "Einige der Unseren haben ein kleines Xenos-Schiff gekapert, das zur Reparatur an einem abgelegenen, unbenutzten Dock lag. Sie haben die Crew unauffällig eliminiert, aber den Piloten am Leben gelassen, damit er das Schiff in den {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} zurückbringen kann. Zu dem Dock gelangen wir durch ein Dimensionsportal in unserer alten Basis."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, canlı ve enerjik bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Birkaç askerimiz, uzaktaki kullanılmayan bir rıhtımda tamir için demirlenmiş, küçük bir zeno gemisini ele geçirdi. Mürettebatı sessizce öldürüp gemiyi {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzaya{/g} götürebilmesi için pilotu sağ bıraktılar. Eski üssümüzde bulunan boyutsal portalı kullanarak rıhtıma ulaşabiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is brisk and energetic:{/n} "Some of our own have captured a small xenos ship that was moored for repairs at a remote unused dock. They eliminated the crew quietly, but left the pilot alive to sail the ship back to {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g}. We can get to the dock through a dimensional portal located at our old base."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser, canlı ve enerjik bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Birkaç askerimiz, uzakta kullanılmayan bir rıhtımda tamir için demirlenmiş küçük bir zeno gemisini ele geçirdi. Mürettebatı sessizce ortadan kaldırdılar ama gemiyi {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzay{/g}a geri getirebilmesi için pilotu sağ bıraktılar. Eski üssümüzde bulunan boyutsal portalı kullanarak rıhtıma ulaşabiliriz."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
